author: Telangana Today
title: US revitalised partnership with allies and nations like India amidst China‚Äôs rise: President Biden-Telangana Today
text:
Washington: The US has revitalised its partnership with its allies and countries like India, Australia and Japan, amidst the rise of China , President Joe Biden has said, as he accused Beijing of indulging in unfair economic practices and endangering peace across the Taiwan Strait.
Biden, 81, in his final State of the Union Address before a joint session of the US Congress on Thursday, said the US wants competition with China, but not conflict.
Also Read Editorial: Fear in foreign land Biden, seeking re-election in November, said America is in a stronger position to win the competition for the 21st Century against China.
‚ÄúWe are standing up against China‚Äôs unfair economic practice, standing up for peace and stability across the Taiwan Strait. We revitalised our partnership with allies and the Pacific, India. Australia, Japan, South and South Korea,‚Äù Biden, a Democrat, said.
China considers Taiwan as its breakaway province and insists it should be unified with the mainland, by force if necessary. Taiwan, however, sees itself as completely distinct from China.
China has been ramping up its military offensive against the self-ruled island of more than 23 million people, triggering global concerns including from the US.
He said he several times found his Republican fellow members saying that China is on the rise and America is falling behind.
‚ÄúThey‚Äôve got it backwards. America is rising,‚Äù Biden said.
Biden‚Äôs China comments came a day after Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi escalated Beijing‚Äôs verbal attacks on the United States.
On the sidelines of an annual meeting of China‚Äôs Parliament, Wang accused the United States of trying to contain China through sanctions and insisted that Washington has ‚Äúwrong perceptions‚Äù about Beijing.
‚ÄúThe means to suppress China are constantly updated, the list of unilateral sanctions is constantly extended, and the desire to inflict punishment on China has reached an unimaginable level,‚Äù said Wang during an interaction with local and foreign media in Beijing.
The US has imposed sanctions against China on a range of issues, from human rights abuses to its growing military relations with Russia.
China is expected to get more public attention as the US presidential election campaign intensifies in the coming weeks.
In his address, Biden claimed that the US has the best economy in the world.
‚ÄúSince I‚Äôve come to office, our GDP is up. And our trade deficit with China is down to the lowest point in over a decade,‚Äù he said ‚ÄúI‚Äôve made sure that the most advanced American technologies can‚Äôt be used in China‚Äôs weapons. Frankly, for all his tough talk on China, it never occurred to my predecessor to do that,‚Äù Biden said.
‚ÄúAnd we‚Äôre in a stronger position to win the competition for the 21st Century against China or anyone else for that matter,‚Äù said the president.
Following Super Tuesday contests, decks have become clear for a rematch between Biden and Trump in the November 5 presidential elections.
Biden, who is the oldest president of the US, also slammed his Republican rival and predecessor Donald Trump, 77, on several issues ranging from his recent comment on Russian President Vladimir Putin, immigration, the January 6 insurrection, abortion, and gun control.

author: Patty Guerra; UC Merced
title: New Aerospace Engineering Major Links UC Merced to Skyrocketing Industry | Office of the Chancellor
text: The newest major in UC Merced's School of Engineering is one of the most exciting subjects in - and out of - this world. [Aerospace engineering](https://ae.ucmerced.edu/), one of the fastest-growing industries in the state, will be available as a major area of study at the university in fall 2025. The adoption of an aerospace engineering major at UC Merced is exciting for all the romantic reasons you might expect - visions of alumni working on satellites and spacecraft and taking part in missions to explore the vast frontier. "As the quest for expanding our footprint to other habitable worlds in the solar system continues, aerospace engineering knowledge will be the important link that contributes to faster, cleaner, efficient vehicles to achieve our goals," according to the proposal for the major. "The same aerospace engineer will also be able to improve our air transportation between different parts of the world. Reduced emissions, noise, and fuel consumption are some of the important near-future objectives that will revolutionize air transport and a degree in aerospace engineering is crucial to achieving all of these." It also makes great sense from a financial perspective. The global space economy is growing at a furious pace. It hit $469 billion in 2021, according to the nonprofit [ Space Foundation](https://cie.spacefoundation.org/space-industry-growth-where-are-the-opportunities-in-2022/). In the first six months of 2022 alone, a record-setting 1,022 spacecraft were placed in orbit - more than in the first 52 years of the Space Age, the foundation said. Investment bank Morgan Stanley estimates the economic potential of space commerce business at $1 trillion by 2040. This rapid expansion of the space industry has been driven by increased private sector investment, rising demand for space data and, especially, advances in technology such as reusable launch vehicles and miniature satellites. "Technology for space missions is evolving rapidly and we will prepare the next generation of engineers to be part of this evolution," said Professor Ashlie Martini, chair of the Department of Mechanical Engineering, which developed the aerospace engineering major. "The incredible growth of the global space economy is a testament to the talented professionals who innovate new ideas for space every day to help humanity and the ever-growing reliance on those benefits from space for all the people of Earth," Space Foundation CEO Tom Zelibor said in a news release. "The booming space industry will need to expand its workforce to sustain this kind of growth. That means delivering the message to everyone, from kindergarten on up, that they have a place in space at one of the most exciting times since we first reached for the stars." California is among the leaders in the sector, with the number of jobs projected to grow 8.5 percent in the next decade. There is quite a bit of enthusiasm on campus for the new major. "We are incredibly excited about the new aerospace engineering major. We already have an optional emphasis in aerospace engineering as part of the mechanical engineering major and many UC Merced alumni are working in the space and aerospace industries," Martini said. "The new dedicated major will be of interest to students who want to focus on these industries in their careers." The aerospace engineering major will prepare engineers to design, construct and test aircraft, missiles and spacecraft. Already, UC Merced students and alumni have successfully obtained full-time employment and internship experiences with aerospace employers including Collins Aerospace, Lockheed Martin, Northrup Grumman, Boeing, SpaceX, Blue Origin, Jet Propulsion Lab (JPL), NASA and Raytheon, said Manny Machado, career specialist for the School of Engineering. The major includes a variety of skills outside of engineering, including physical sciences, mathematics, computing, technology, critical reasoning, technological expertise and communication skills. And the opportunities are nearly as endless as space itself. The United States [ Chamber of Commerce](https://www.uschamber.com/space/space-economy-4-trends-to-watch-in-2022) points out that "private sector business leaders and government agencies have transformed what was once merely a dream of travel among the stars into a fully functioning global market there's already a fully functioning global market - forming private aerospace companies, launching rockets and satellites, and even creating opportunities for space travel." Duval Johnson, UC Merced alumnus and mechanical engineering department external advisory board member, works at JPL and has firsthand experience with the rapid growth of the aerospace industry. "It is a thrilling time to be an engineer working in aerospace and I am pleased that more UC Merced students will be able to shape the future of the field," Johnson said.

organizations.name: new aerospace engineering major links uc merced to skyrocketing industry | office

author: globo.com
title: Babu Santana lamenta morte de Maguila: 'N√£o estava pronto pra sua partida' | TV & Famosos | gshow
text:
1 de 1 Babu Santana lamenta morte de Maguila ‚Äî Foto: Foto: Reprodu√ß√£o/Instagram Babu Santana lamenta morte de Maguila ‚Äî Foto: Foto: Reprodu√ß√£o/Instagram
A morte da lenda do boxe nesta quinta-feira (24) deixou muita gente abalada. Os famosos usaram suas redes sociais para lamentar o ocorrido . Babu Santana , que foi escalado para interpretar Maguila na cinebiografia do lutador, publicou um texto de despedida.
"MAGUILA √© representatividade, √© for√ßa, √© luta, √© resili√™ncia e resist√™ncia ‚úäüèæ. E √© com muita tristeza e pesar que venho escrever esse adeus‚Ä¶ Eu n√£o estava pronto pra sua partida. Lembro do dia em que voc√™ soube que eu iria te interpretar e voc√™ disse: ‚ÄúQue bom que √© ele, porque √© bonito igual a mim. E tantas outras lembran√ßas especiais que ficaram guardadas‚Äù, publicou o ex-BBB em um trecho da publica√ß√£o.
O ator foi escalado para viver Maguila em um filme biogr√°fico h√° quatro anos e lamentou que o lutador n√£o poder√° assistir a homenagem em vida.
"Eu e Josmar quer√≠amos tanto que voc√™ pudesse ver o filme‚Ä¶ pra n√≥s √© uma tristeza voc√™ n√£o ver sua homenagem em vida, mas aqui, continuaremos perpetuando sua hist√≥ria pra que ela jamais seja esquecida. Vamos celebrar sua vida da forma que voc√™ merece. SUA HIST√ìRIA √â ETERNA!"
No fim, Babu afirmou que o lutador n√£o foi campe√£o apenas nos ringues e sim na vida. Aproveitou para deixar uma mensagem de conforto aos familiares, f√£s e amigos.
"Pra sempre ser√° nosso her√≥i. Meus p√™sames aos familiares, amigos e f√£s. Descanse em paz Adilson. üñ§ Com amor, Babu".
A morte de Maguila
o lutador Jos√© Adilson Rodrigues dos Santos, o Maguila, morreu nesta quinta-feira (24), em S√£o Paulo, aos 66 anos. O ex-peso-pesado sofria de dem√™ncia pugil√≠stica, doen√ßa neurodegenerativa que adquiriu por conta das pancadas na cabe√ßa que sofreu ao longo dos 17 anos de carreira.
A confirma√ß√£o do falecimento de Maguila foi feita por sua esposa, Irani Pinheiro, em entrevista ao canal de TV Record. O boxeador j√° estava morando em uma cl√≠nica h√° mais de sete anos, em Itu, no interior de S√£o Paulo.
Veja tamb√©m!

author: Ima Ekanem
title: 2024 Budget: Abass, 10th House Have Delivered on Promise, Says Agbese - THISDAYLIVE
text: The deputy spokesperson, House of Representatives, Hon. Philip Agbese, has congratulated the Speaker, Tajudeen Abbas; Deputy Speaker, Benjamin Kalu; Chairman of Appropriation Committee, Hon. Abubakar Bichi and the entire members of the 10th House for delivering on the promise on the 2024 budget. The legislators had, during a special plenary on Saturday, passed a record N28.7 trillion as the budget for 2024, with the appropriation increasing by N1.27 trillion ‚Äî from the N27.5 trillion proposed by President Bola Tinubu. Out of the N28.7 trillion, the sum of N1,742,786,788,150 was allocated for statutory transfers; recurrent expenditure amounts to N8,768,513,380,852; capital expenditure stands at N9,995,143,298,028 and debt service was set at N8,270,960,606,831. The Chairman of the House Committee on Appropriation, Bichi, had, while presenting the report at Saturday‚Äôs plenary, explained the rationale behind increasing the estimates of the appropriation bill, saying revenue-generating agencies and government-owned enterprises (GOEs) had a meeting with the committee and have pledged a substantial revenue increase in 2024 to support the budget. While reacting Saturday night, Agbese lauded the painstaking efforts of his colleagues, especially the leadership of the House and the Appropriation Committee, in ensuring the 2024 Appropriation Bill was passed as promised. As a result of this sacrifice, Agbese said: ‚ÄúNigerians will not take this for granted. The 10th House is known for creating discomfort for its members in order to make Nigerians comfortable. This is the people‚Äôs House and I‚Äôm glad the people are better off with the kind of leadership being provided here.‚Äù The deputy spokesperson recalled how the House adjourned its plenary for three weeks to enable its various committees interface with relevant agencies and scrutinized the 2024 budget estimates. He said: ‚ÄúAt a point, we were almost going to spend our Christmas celebrations in the office. We had to suspend the House rules and were coming to the National Assembly on non-working days (weekends) and many times staying back at non-office hours. ‚ÄúToday that is Saturday and at a time when everyone is out of his station preparing for new year celebration with his family, we came all out for the budget to be passed. I thank God we fulfilled our promise. The 10th House under His Excellency, Hon. Tajudeen Abbas, must be commended for this. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm sure too that the executive would be glad that the legislative arm lived up to its mandate and expectations. We are in alignment with the manifestos contained in the ‚ÄòRenewed Hope Agenda‚Äô of President Bola Ahmed Tinubu and with the resolve of all of us to sustain Nigeria on the pedestal of January-December budget circle.‚Äù Agbese, who represents Ado/Okpokwu/Ogbadibo Federal Constituency of Benue State, also hailed the decision of the Bichi-led Appropriation Committee for allocating the differential N1.27 trillion to the capital component rather than recurrent expenditure. ‚ÄúThis is a good decision. This is the first time the capital component of the nation‚Äôs budget is bigger than recurrent,‚Äù he added. President Tinubu had presented a budget of N27.5 trillion to a joint section of the National Assembly on November 29 in Abuja. Abbas had, during the budget presentation, said President Tinubu‚Äôs government could not afford to fail Nigerians by changing the rots and charting a new course for the masses. According to the Speaker, it is well-known that millions of citizens are living through difficult times. ‚ÄúFor this reason, they also look to the Tinubu-led government to provide quick and sustainable solutions. The antecedents of the president and your track record in governance inspire a lot of hope in Nigerians, and it is for this reason that we cannot afford to fail Nigerians,‚Äù Abbas stated. Also during a resumed plenary session Tuesday, 19th December, 2023, following the resumption of the green chamber after a brief recess to allow committees to scrutinise the budget estimates submitted by the president, Abbas had assured Nigerians that the 2024 budget would be passed on Saturday, December 30, 2023.

author: Daniele D'Alessandro
title: Che tempo far√† in Sicilia nel weekend? Le previsioni meteo: occhio alle piogge
text:
Il weekend ha avuto inizio, con un venerd√¨ piovoso soprattutto nella parte orientale della Sicilia : ma che tempo far√† per il resto del fine settimana? I prossimi giorni saranno caratterizzati da tempo variabile , con alternanza di fasi pi√π instabili con rovesci associati a pause asciutte.
Una saccatura atlantica, attualmente presente sulla parte settentrionale della penisola iberica, sar√† agganciata dal flusso zonale e si sposter√† sull‚ÄôItalia tra sabato e domenica. La Sicilia si trover√† un po‚Äô ai margini ma saranno comunque possibili rovesci tra la serata di venerd√¨ e la prima parte della giornata di sabato e poi durante la giornata di domenica, quando la saccatura affonder√† maggiormente verso sud. Dal punto di vista termico nella prima fase si avranno temperature oltre le medie del periodo, a causa del richiamo mite imposto dalla saccatura ad ovest poi, a partire dalla serata di sabato, √® atteso un sensibile calo termico con valori che si porteranno qualche grado sotto media.
Sabato 14 dicembre Nella notte e al mattino cielo nuvoloso su gran parte dell‚Äôisola, specie sui settori centro settentrionali e occidentali, dove saranno possibili rovesci di debole o moderata intensit√†. Dalle ore centrali della giornata schiarite in aumento su gran parte dell‚Äôisola, con cielo parzialmente nuvoloso o velato da nubi alte un po‚Äô su tutti i settori. Temperature senza variazioni di rilievo sia nei valori massimi che minimi, qualche grado oltre le medie del periodo. Venti di maestrale di moderata intensit√†. Mari in generale mossi, poco mosso il Tirreno.
Domenica 15 dicembre Sin dal mattino e per il resto della giornata cielo in prevalenza nuvoloso o coperto da nubi medio-alte su tutta l‚Äôisola. Addensamenti pi√π compatti sulla Sicilia centro settentrionale e occidentale dove saranno possibili rovesci di debole o moderata intensit√†. Neve in serata sopra i 1300/1400 metri.
Temperature in calo sia nei valori massimi che minimi, qualche grado sotto le medie stagionali.
Venti di maestrale di moderata intensit√†. Mari mossi o molto mossi.

author: Redacci√≥n Los Andes
title: Otro caso "Diablito" Echeverri: un joya de las inferiores de Independiente no viaja a la pretemporada por problemas con su contrato
text: Independiente de Avellaneda tom√≥ una decisi√≥n dr√°stica con el delantero juvenil Santiago L√≥pez y le comunic√≥ que no ser√° parte de la pretemporada en Miami, Estados Unidos, por no renovar su v√≠nculo con el club. La decisi√≥n fue tomada por la Comisi√≥n Directiva del club, y es exclusivamente porque el joven que supo brillar en el Mundial Sub-17 con la Selecci√≥n Argentina a√∫n no extendi√≥ su v√≠nculo con la entidad de Avellaneda que finaliza en diciembre de 2024. Si bien las partes ven√≠an hablando desde hace varios d√≠as para evitar este conflicto, no hubo acuerdo, ya que la idea de la directiva era que L√≥pez firme un nuevo contrato con el club por tres temporadas m√°s, hasta diciembre de 2027, con una suba de su cl√°usula de recisi√≥n que por ahora es de 15 millones de d√≥lares. Pero el problema radica en que a mediados de 2024, con solo seis meses de contrato por delante, podr√° negociar con cualquier club que lo quiera, y en las √∫ltimas horas se filtro que su entorno manejar√≠a una oferta desde el exterior de 1.5 millones de d√≥lares. Lo cierto es que, mientras no haya acuerdo entre la representaci√≥n del jugador e Independiente, L√≥pez no entrenar√° m√°s con el primer equipo, m√°s all√° de que el entrenador, Carlos Tevez, manifest√≥ en m√°s de una ocasi√≥n que lo tendr√≠a en cuenta.

author: Osvaldo Cardosa Sam√≥n
title: Damnificado estado brasile√±o enfrentar√° otro azote de lluvias
text:
El vaticinio indica que, entre el 10, 11 y 12 de mayo, las precipitaciones con mayor intensidad ser√°n entre el centro-norte y este gaucho, incluyendo el litoral norte del territorio y el sur del estado de Santa Catarina.
Durante este per√≠odo, los vol√∫menes de lluvia pueden pasar de los 100 mil√≠metros.
Seg√∫n la predicci√≥n, los vientos cambiar√°n de direcci√≥n y soplar√°n predominantemente desde el sur.
Entre el final del domingo y el lunes, las r√°fagas variar√°n de oeste a sur y despu√©s del sur, con velocidad superior a 30 kil√≥metros por hora. El 14 de mayo, los vientos se debilitan.
De acuerdo con el Inmet, esta condici√≥n ocurre debido a la inestabilidad que regresa con m√°s fuerza a Rio Grande do Sul, al final de esta semana. Inicialmente, como frente caliente, una vez que el fr√≠o retrocede de Santa Catarina para el estado gaucho.
El fin de semana esta onda glacial permanecer√° en Rio Grande do Sul, causando √°reas de inestabilidad y un gradual ingreso de aire g√©lido.
A partir del lunes, cuando el fr√≠o gana fuerza y podr√≠a provocar heladas a partir del martes, el amplio refuerzo de aire seco, de origen polar, deber√° alejar la inestabilidad.
Meteor√≥logos apuntan que los vol√∫menes de lluvia previstos pueden causar nuevos trastornos en zonas afectadas anteriormente.
Por este motivo, el Inmet alerta y recomienda seguir las directrices de la Defensa Civil.
De acuerdo con el m√°s reciente bolet√≠n de ese √≥rgano de socorro, se mantiene en 107 el n√∫mero de muertos, en raz√≥n de los temporales, y hay un √≥bito bajo investigaci√≥n.
El estado registra hasta el momento 134 desaparecidos y 754 heridos.
Tambi√©n se notifican 327 mil 105 mil personas fuera de casa. De ese total, 68 mil 519 en refugios y 327 mil 105 desplazadas (permanecen en moradas de familiares o amigos).
La cifra de municipios afectados por las lluvias e inundaciones subi√≥ a 431 y el de damnificados a un mill√≥n 742 mil 969.
El gobernador de Rio Grande do Sul, Eduardo Leite, manifest√≥ que las autoridades buscan la dignidad, protecci√≥n y cuidado de cada una de las personas que viven en refugios.
A largo plazo, la pretensi√≥n de Leite es definir √°reas en seguridad, en las cuales establecer construcciones est√°ndar de casas para la poblaci√≥n v√≠ctima de la cat√°strofe, la mayor en la historia de la divisi√≥n territorial.
rgh/ocs

author: CMS Medios
title: Maduro ordena una "acci√≥n conjunta defensiva" en respuesta al env√≠o de un barco de guerra brit√°nico a Guyana | Noticias de M√©xico | EL IMPARCIAL
text: Maduro ordena una "acci√≥n conjunta defensiva" en respuesta al env√≠o de un barco de guerra brit√°nico a Guyana El presidente venezolano dijo que el env√≠o de un barco militar brit√°nico a Guyana es una "ruptura de los acuerdos" alcanzados con su hom√≥logo guyan√©s. El presidente de Venezuela, Nicol√°s Maduro, dijo este jueves que orden√≥ "la activaci√≥n de una acci√≥n conjunta defensiva de la Fuerza Armada Nacional Bolivariana" frente a las costas del Esequibo, regi√≥n que su pa√≠s se disputa con la vecina Guyana. La noticia se conoce pocos d√≠as despu√©s de que el gobierno brit√°nico anunciara que enviar√° un barco de guerra a Guyana en un gesto de apoyo diplom√°tico y militar a su antigua colonia. En una reuni√≥n con el alto mando militar transmitida por la televisi√≥n estatal, Maduro asegur√≥ que el env√≠o del patrullero brit√°nico HMS Trent supone una ‚Äúruptura‚Äù del esp√≠ritu del acuerdo que alcanz√≥ con el presidente guyan√©s, Irfan Ali, para no usar la fuerza en la resoluci√≥n de las diferencias entre ambos pa√≠ses en la reuni√≥n que ambos l√≠deres mantuvieron en San Vicente y las Granadinas el pasado 14 de diciembre. Maduro dijo que el despliegue del buque brit√°nico "es pr√°cticamente una amenaza militar de Londres contra nuestro pa√≠s".
